author: Staff Correspondent
title: SSC Mathematics question allegedly leaked
text:
SSC Mathematics question allegedly leaked Staff Correspondent | Update: 23:35, Feb 12, 2017 0 Like 
The question paper of Mathematics (compulsory) subject of the Secondary School Certificate (SSC) examination of Dhaka Board was allegedly leaked on Sunday. 
Copies of the question paper received from various sources prior to the examination were found similar to the original questionnaire. 
Secondary and Higher Secondary Education Board, Dhaka, examination controller Tapan Kumar Sarkar said the copy of Mathematics question paper handed over to him by a journalist in the morning was same to the question paper served to the students in the examination. 
He claimed that the question might be leaked from any of the examination centres just before the examination. 
He said such incidents occurred previous years as well and the people responsible were apprehended in this connection. Police are trying to nab the teachers involved in this incident also, he added.
